verses.verse: Ho<WH1945>, every one that thirsts<WH6771>, come<WH3212> you to the waters<WH4325>, and he that has no money<WH3701>; come<WH3212> you<WH7666>, buy, and eat<WH398>; Yes<WH3212>, come, buy<WH7666> wine<WH3196> and milk<WH2461> without money<WH3701> and without price<WH4242>.

Therefore do you spend<WH8254> money<WH3701> for that which is not bread<WH3899>? and your labor<WH3018> for that which satisfies<WH7654> not<WH3808>? listen<WH8085> diligently<WH8085> unto me<WH398>, and eat you that which is good<WH2896>, and let your soul<WH5315> delight<WH6026> itself in fatness<WH1880>.

Incline<WH5186> your ear<WH241>, and come<WH3212> unto me<WH8085>: hear, and your soul<WH5315> shall live<WH2421>; and I will make<WH3772> a everlasting<WH5769> covenant<WH1285> with you<WH539>, even the sure mercies<WH2617> of David<WH1732>.
Behold<WH5414>, I have given him for a witness<WH5707> to the people<WH3816>, a leader<WH5057> and commander<WH6680> to the people<WH3816>.

Behold<WH7121>, you shall call a nation<WH1471> that you know<WH3045> not<WH1471>, and nations that knew<WH3045> not you shall run<WH7323> unto you because of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, and for the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478>; for he has glorified you<WH6286>.
Seek<WH1875> you the Lord<WH3068> while he may be found<WH4672>, call<WH7121> you upon him while he is near<WH7138>:

Let the wicked<WH7563> forsake<WH5800> his way<WH1870>, and the unrighteous<WH205> man<WH376> his thoughts<WH4284>: and let him return<WH7725> unto the Lord<WH3068>, and he will have mercy<WH7355> upon him<WH430>; and to our God, for he will abundantly<WH7235> pardon<WH5545>.
For my thoughts<WH4284> are not your thoughts<WH4284>, neither are your ways<WH1870> my ways<WH1870>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>.
For as the heavens<WH8064> are higher<WH1361> than the earth<WH776>, so are my ways<WH1870> higher<WH1361> than your ways<WH1870>, and my thoughts<WH4284> than your thoughts<WH4284>.

For as the rain<WH1653> comes down<WH3381>, and the snow<WH7950> from heaven<WH8064>, and returns<WH7725> not there<WH7301>, but waters the earth<WH776>, and makes it bring forth<WH3205> and bud<WH6779>, that it may give<WH5414> seed<WH2233> to the sower<WH2232>, and bread<WH3899> to the eater<WH398>:

So shall my word<WH1697> be that goes forth<WH3318> out of my mouth<WH6310>: it shall not return<WH7725> unto me void<WH7387>, but it shall accomplish<WH6213> that which I please<WH2654>, and it shall prosper<WH6743> in the thing whereto I sent it<WH7971>.

For you shall go out<WH3318> with joy<WH8057>, and be led forth<WH2986> with peace<WH7965>: the mountains<WH2022> and the hills<WH1389> shall break forth<WH6476> before<WH6440> you into singing<WH7440>, and all the trees<WH6086> of the field<WH7704> shall clap<WH4222> their hands<WH3709>.

Instead of the thorn<WH5285> shall come up<WH5927> the fir tree<WH1265>, and instead of the brier<WH5636> shall come up<WH5927> the myrtle tree<WH1918>: and it shall be to the Lord<WH3068> for a name<WH8034>, for a everlasting<WH5769> sign<WH226> that shall not be cut off<WH3772>.
